layoutConfig.description: Configure the skills page layout here. Adjust grid columns, gaps, card sizes, etc.

certificationsSection.description: Certifications are organized into columns (A1, A2, A3, etc). Adjust which items go into which column.

howToAdjustLayout: 1. To change number of skill card columns on desktop, edit 'gridColumns' in skillsSection
2. To change certification card widths, edit 'columnWidth' and 'wideColumnWidth'
3. To reorganize certifications, edit the 'column' property in certifications.json
4. To add/remove certification columns per row, adjust 'columnsPerRow'
5. For custom styling, edit app/globals.css under 'Skills Page Layout' section

certificationColumns.A1: First column - Programming certifications (CPP, Dart, Bash)
certificationColumns.A2: Second column - Python, Embedded C, HTML
certificationColumns.A5: IDE tools - VS Code, Jupyter, PHP Storm
certificationColumns.A10: Operating Systems - Ubuntu, Kali, Android, Fedora
